sn35.162:1.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma kotthiko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.162:1.2: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.162:2.1: “Yam kho, kotthika, aniccam tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.3: Cakkhu kho, kotthika, aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.4: Rupa anicca; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.5: Cakkhuvinnanam aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.6: Cakkhusamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.7: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.162:2.8: jivha anicca; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.9: Rasa anicca; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.10: Jivhavinnanam aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.11: Jivhasamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.12: Yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.162:2.13: mano anicco; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.14: Dhamma anicca; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.15: Manovinnanam aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.16: Manosamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.17: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccam; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.162:2.18: Yam kho, kotthika, aniccam tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
